Article.ArticleTitle: Pulmonary rehabilitation in long COVID: more than just natural recovery!?

Abstract.AbstractText: In the light of missing randomised controlled trials, some arguments suggest that pulmonary rehabilitation has beneficial effects beyond natural recovery https://bit.ly/3ze2xvw.
